timeline.message:
Add new 'getoffer offer-id' api method

There are a number of use cases where a user may want to see a single
offer instead of every offer for a currency pair on the buy or sell side.
The changes are:

- Add getoffer to grpc.proto
- Add new method to GrpcOffersService, CoreApi, CoreOffersService
- Add new method to CLI
- Adjust create offer tests to use this new convenience

timeline.bodyText: Not wrong, but it's a bit odd to make list when we're looking for one element. .findAny() returns an Optional<> which you could then do offer.isPresent() and return offer.get() making it clear we only expect to find one offer.
timeline.author: sqrrm

timeline.bodyText: As we expect only one I would use a findAny and create an optional instead of a list.
